name: WatchOut
description:
You play as a space ship pilot that pilots a needlessly complicated space ship, in an asteroid infested space.

As if this whole scenario is not bizarre enough, your space ship will do some random things on its own, just to make sure that you are screaming loud enough when you inevitably crash.... and hopefully try again!?!
I wonder who in their right mind designed this ship?

Music used from:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Gargoyles_Numb_End/Arp_220__Arp_299/Arp_220

submited for #gmtkjam2020
